quote: It's not what you've got; it's what you do that makes the difference. – Celestine Chua
fact: The word "Checkmate" in chess comes from the Persian phrase "Shah Mat," which means "the king is dead."
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: I’ve deleted the phone numbers of all the Germans I know from my mobile phone. Now it’s Hans free.
